channel.title: travel journal on daiyi
channel.description: Recent content in travel journal on daiyi

item.title: Japan with meimei
item.description: I went to visit my meimei while she was studying in Japan \o/ I have quite a number of these pages, but I’m holding off on posting the scans because I’m possibly going to reshape & distribute them as a zine (:

item.title: Thailand: watercolour travel journals
item.description: I spent a couple weeks in Thailand in 2015. I encountered many bugs, many of them are captured below.
